patterns: i dont know what to study
can you help me find course suitable for me?
can you give me some suggestion
responses: I will try to help you figure out what is your interest, no worries, but at first can i ask you several questions to know more about you?{

patterns: what else you can suggest me
responses: x
Hello, nice to meet you. I'm Tina. I can help you to find a suitable course.
Nice to meet you, I'm Tina. I can help you to find a suitable course.
Hi there, I'm Tina. I can help you to find a suitable course.

patterns: Thank you and have a nice day
responses: Sad to see you go :( good bye
Okay good bye, have a nice day
Goodbye!
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure
Sorry, can't understand you
Please give me more info
Not sure I understand
You can call me TinaBot.
I'm TinaBot!
TARUC provides pre-university courses, undergraduate courses and postgraduate courses

patterns: What is the estimated total fees of pursuing a programme
how much does this course cost
do there have any other charges
how much is the enrollment fee
how much is the registration fee
how much is the resources fee
how to pay the tuition fee
how can i get more details
responses: All the details of the course you can get it from the link provided. Feels free to contact us if you have any inquiry at https://www.tarc.edu.my/contact-us/.

patterns: When can I apply for financial aid
How can I check my financial aid application status
when is the deadline to apply financial aid
responses: You may visit our website to get more details about the financial aids at https://www.tarc.edu.my/.
